name: portworx-elastic
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS elastic service is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/elasticsearch.html
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS elastic service is being uninstalled
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: CPU: 4.5 | Memory: 11264MB

More specifically, each instance type requires:

Master node: 3 instances | 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Data node: 2 instances | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM

Ingest node: 1 instance | 0.5 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Coordinator node: 1 instance | 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Portworx should be installed on the Private Agents to be able to provision volumes.

Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content from the community.
